rules.greater_or_equals_zero: The field must be greater or equals to zero
rules.not_zero: The field must not be zero

password.format: The password must contains 8 to 20 characters and a capital letter

rules.future_date_rule: The date must be in the future.

image_form.image_size: The image size cannot be up 5MB
image_form.title: Upload an image

login.subtitle: to enter TravelApp
login.title: Login
login.error: There was an error trying to login to TravelApp. Please, try again later.

errors.422: The provided email already corresponds to an user.
errors.default: There was an error while creating your user. Please, try again later.

signup.title: Complete your information
signup.password_repeat_rule: Those passwords didn’t match. Try again.
signup.welcome_text: Your registrations has succesed. You will receive an email in a moment with your user data.

trip_new.success_text: Your trip was successfully created, now you'll be able to add activities and some more details.
trip_new.error: There was an error creating your trip. Please, try again later.

trip_not_found.message: Ups... The trip you are looking for does't not exists.
trip_not_found.redirect: Try visiting the home page and search for another trip.

user_account.title: My Account Information
user_account.error_update: There was an error updating your account information. Please try again later.
user_account.error_passwords_match: The entered password didn't match with your current password.
user_account.error_change_password: There was an error changing your password. Please try again later.

page_not_found.message: Sorry, we couldn't find that page
page_not_found.redirect: Try visiting the home page and search for a trip you may enjoy.

tripform.title: Let's create a new trip!
tripform.name: Name
tripform.description_hint: Give others a tip of what kind of trip are you planning
tripform.date_rule: Date from cannot be after Date to

trip_activity_form.title: Create new activity
trip_activity_form.name: Name
trip_activity_form.name_length_rule: The Name cannot be longer than 40 characters.

trip_activities.create_error: There was an error creating a new activity. Please, try again later.
trip_activities.get_activities_error: There was an error trying to obtain the activities. Please, try again later.
trip_activities.delete_dialog_message: Are you sure that you want to delete the activity?
trip_activities.update_error: There was an error updating the activity. Please, try again later.
trip_activities.delete_error: There was an error deleting the activity. Please, try again later.

trip_card.error: There was an error trying to obtain the trip. Please try again later.
trip_card.error_update: There was an error updating the trip. Please try again later.
trip_card.change_image_error: There was an error uploading the trip portrait. Please try again later.

trip_activities_list.no_data: no activities were found for the trip. Try creating a new one.

trip_members.get_error: There was an error trying to obtain the trip membes. Please, try again later.
trip_members.not_members: You must be a member to see the other members of the trip.
trip_members.get_requests_error: There was an error trying to obtain the join requests. Please, try again later.

trip_join_button.join_dialog_message: You can write a message so that the trip administrators understand why you are interested in joining the trip

trip_join_form.message_size_rule: the length of the message must be less than 255 characters
trip_join_form.error: There was an error trying to send your join request. Please, try again later.

trip_join_request_card.accept_error: There was an error accepting the join request. Please, try again later.

trip_commments.get_error: There was an error obteining the trip comments. Please, try again later.

trip_paginated_list.no_results: No matching trips found, try creating a new one!

user_form.title: Change Account Information
user_form.biography_size_rule: The biography must be shorter than 500 characters long.

password_recovery.title: Recover your TravelApp password
password_recovery.subtitle: Tell us the email address associated with your TravelApp account, and we’ll send you an email with a link to reset your password
password_recovery.success: Thanks! If your TravelApp email address match, you'll get an email with a link to reset your password shortly.
password_recovery.error: There was an error processing the information. Please try again later.
password_recovery.login: Click here to go to login page.

change_password.success: Your password has been changed successfully.
change_password.not_found_or_expired: Your password recovery process has expired or you enter a wrong url.
change_password.error: There was an error changing your password. Please, try again later.
